arn.description: Amazon Resource Name for managing permissions and API interactions

cache_nodes.description: Details of all cache nodes in the cluster, useful for monitoring and scaling

cluster_address.description: Endpoint address to connect to the cache cluster

configuration_endpoint.description: Primary endpoint for managing cluster configuration and connections

engine_version_actual.description: The actual version of the cache engine in use, helpful for compatibility checks

id.description: Unique identifier for referencing the cache cluster in configurations

tags_all.description: Set of key-value tags for categorizing and organizing resources
